original_title: Statement from Bed, Bath & Beyond CEO Marcus Lemonis on why they will not open or operate in California   — The Donald
article_summary: Bed Bath & Beyond will not open stores in California, citing unspecified reasons, and the company's decision has sparked controversy, with some users expressing disappointment over the discontinuation of MyPillow products and the company's perceived poor treatment of customers. The company's future is uncertain, with some commenters suggesting it has gone bankrupt and been rebranded by Overstock.com.</s>
